title: hugeblack
author: hugeblack
content: Has anyone tried ---> https://silent.link/ I plan to use it to get SMS messages without showing my real number, I tried to understand how the site works, but I can't find any guide and I don't want to pay $9 to try a service I know nothing about..if one of you knows how silent.link works or has tried this service or any anonymous (UAE number) eSIM provider that accept bitcoin, I will be happy to explain it to me/us.All I want is to get SMS messages using my country number (United Arab Emirates), I did not find it supported by any Anonymous Bitcoin service, so if anyone knows any service that does that, it will be useful to me.
